0110010101011101 0111001100010110 0 -> sum: 1101100001110011, cout: 0

1110001100110001 1101111111001110 1 -> sum: 1100001100000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
